name: Fallen Solar
description: The Fallen Solar is a large celestial creature with a radiant presence, notable for its exceptional power and impressive physique. It wields a holy sword that combines slashing and radiant damage in combat.
memorable: Known for its ability to detect lies and influence opponents with divine charisma, the Fallen Solar can absorb life energy from slain humanoids to gain temporary hit points.
goals: To uphold truth, enforce a strong sense of integrity, and act as a life-draining force on the battlefield.
relations: It may interact with other celestials or serve as a guardian or enforcer among celestial realms.
environment: Typically found in areas of great importance or celestial significance, possibly in heavenly realms or locations of conflict between good and evil.
strengths: Possesses high Strength and Charisma, exceptional spellcasting abilities, and a high spell save DC of 25, making it challenging to resist its magic.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to radiant damage despite being resistant to other damage types; relatively poor in Wisdom saving throws.
attacks: Can strike twice with a holy sword, inflicting 23 slashing damage and 21 radiant damage with each hit; also capable of causing area damage with Column of Flame.
most_powerful_ability: Consume Life Energy allows it to absorb life force from slain humanoids for temporary hit points based on their maximum hit points.
equipment: Holy sword as its primary weapon.
senses: Has truesight up to 120 feet, enabling it to detect invisible creatures and see through illusions.
skills: Excels in athletics, history, insight, perception, and religion, demonstrating a well-rounded skill set.
additional_information: Can teleport up to 120 feet for exceptional mobility.
Incapable of lying due to the Champion of Truth ability.
Can heal others for 60 hit points and remove various ailments with Heal action.
Utilizes legendary actions to maintain battlefield control.
Designed as a complex entity capable of both damage and healing.
spellcasting: Innate spellcasting with powerful spells such as commune, control weather, and resurrection, all requiring no material components.
test_queries: fallen solar that absorbs life energy
